sentiment_feed.text: Anybody else’s @UScellular service just quit working?
I can't make calls either, I live in Grafton Wisconsin and the network is down.
My personal and work phones are on your network and not able to place calls.

recommendations: Prioritize restoration of Internet service in Ankeny and Charlotte.
Investigate root cause of network failures in Cedar Rapids and Madison.
Enhance real-time outage communication to reduce customer frustration.
